alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:50AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON... CENTRAL ADAIR AND EAST CENTRAL CHEROKEE COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM CDT... At 450 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Proctor, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Lincoln... Westville... Adair State Park... Proctor... Christie... Cincinnati... Baron... Maryetta... Eldon... Summers... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
